segment.source: How to Install the Application Virtualization Streaming Server
segment.target: How to Install the Application Virtualization Streaming Server

segment.source: How to Install the Application Virtualization Streaming Server
segment.target: How to Install the Application Virtualization Streaming Server

segment.source: How to Install the Application Virtualization Streaming Server
segment.target: How to Install the Application Virtualization Streaming Server

segment.source: The Application Virtualization Streaming Server publishes its applications to clients.
segment.target: The Application Virtualization Streaming Server publishes its applications to clients.

segment.source: In a load-balanced environment, which is typical of large deployments, all servers in a server group should stream the same applications.
segment.target: In a load-balanced environment, which is typical of large deployments, all servers in a server group should stream the same applications.

segment.source: If Application Virtualization Streaming Servers are to stream different applications, assign the servers to different server groups.
segment.target: If Application Virtualization Streaming Servers are to stream different applications, assign the servers to different server groups.

segment.source: In this case, you might also have to increase a server group's capacity.
segment.target: In this case, you might also have to increase a server group's capacity.

segment.source: If you have designated a target computer on the network, with a logon account having local administrative privileges, you can use the following procedure to install the Application Virtualization Streaming Server and assign it to the appropriate server group.
segment.target: If you have designated a target computer on the network, with a logon account having local administrative privileges, you can use the following procedure to install the Application Virtualization Streaming Server and assign it to the appropriate server group.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: The Installation Wizard can create a server group record, if one does not exist, and a record of the Application Virtualization Streaming Server membership in this group.
segment.target: The Installation Wizard can create a server group record, if one does not exist, and a record of the Application Virtualization Streaming Server membership in this group.

segment.source: After you complete the installation process, restart the server.
segment.target: After you complete the installation process, restart the server.

segment.source: To install an Application Virtualization Streaming Server
segment.target: To install an Application Virtualization Streaming Server

segment.source: Verify that no earlier versions of the Application Virtualization Streaming Server are installed on your target computer.
segment.target: Verify that no earlier versions of the Application Virtualization Streaming Server are installed on your target computer.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: Make sure that the App-V Management Server is not installed on this computer.
segment.target: Make sure that the App-V Management Server is not installed on this computer.

segment.source: The two products cannot be installed on the same computer.
segment.target: The two products cannot be installed on the same computer.

segment.source: Navigate to the location of the Application Virtualization System Setup program on the network, either run this program from the network or copy its directory to the target computer, and then double-click the Setup.exe file.
segment.target: Navigate to the location of the Application Virtualization System Setup program on the network, either run this program from the network or copy its directory to the target computer, and then double-click the Setup.exe file.

segment.source: On the Welcome page, click Next.
segment.target: On the Welcome page, click Next.

segment.source: On the License Agreement page, to accept the license terms, select I accept the licensing terms and conditions, and then click Next.
segment.target: On the License Agreement page, to accept the license terms, select I accept the licensing terms and conditions, and then click Next.

segment.source: On the Customer Information page, specify the User name and the organization, and then click Next.
segment.target: On the Customer Information page, specify the User name and the organization, and then click Next.

segment.source: On the Installation Path page, click Browse, specify the location where you want to install the Streaming Server, and then click Next.
segment.target: On the Installation Path page, click Browse, specify the location where you want to install the Streaming Server, and then click Next.

segment.source: On the Connection Security Mode page, select the desired certificate from the drop-down list, and then click Next.
segment.target: On the Connection Security Mode page, select the desired certificate from the drop-down list, and then click Next.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: The Secure Connection Mode setting requires the server to have a server certificate provisioned to it from a public key infrastructure.
segment.target: The Secure Connection Mode setting requires the server to have a server certificate provisioned to it from a public key infrastructure.

segment.source: If a server certificate is not installed on the server, this option is unavailable and cannot be selected.
segment.target: If a server certificate is not installed on the server, this option is unavailable and cannot be selected.

segment.source: You must grant the Network Service account read access to the certificate being used.
segment.target: You must grant the Network Service account read access to the certificate being used.

segment.source: On the TCP Port Configuration page, to use the standard port (554), select Use default port (554).
segment.target: On the TCP Port Configuration page, to use the standard port (554), select Use default port (554).

segment.source: To specify a custom port, select Use custom port, specify the port number in the field provided, and then click Next.
segment.target: To specify a custom port, select Use custom port, specify the port number in the field provided, and then click Next.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: When you install the server in a nonsecure scenario, you can use the default port (554), or you can define a custom port.
segment.target: When you install the server in a nonsecure scenario, you can use the default port (554), or you can define a custom port.

segment.source: On the Content Root page, specify the location on the target computer where SFT files will be saved, and then click Next.
segment.target: On the Content Root page, specify the location on the target computer where SFT files will be saved, and then click Next.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: If the HTTP or RTSP port for the Virtual Application Streaming Server is already allocated, you will be prompted to select a new port.
segment.target: If the HTTP or RTSP port for the Virtual Application Streaming Server is already allocated, you will be prompted to select a new port.

segment.source: Specify the desired port, and then click Next.
segment.target: Specify the desired port, and then click Next.

segment.source: On the Advanced Setting screen, enter the following information:
segment.target: On the Advanced Setting screen, enter the following information:

segment.source: Max client connections
segment.target: Max client connections

segment.source: Connection timeout (sec)
segment.target: Connection timeout (sec)

segment.source: RTSP thread pool size
segment.target: RTSP thread pool size

segment.source: RTSP timeout (sec)
segment.target: RTSP timeout (sec)

segment.source: Number of core processes
segment.target: Number of core processes

segment.source: Core timeout (sec)
segment.target: Core timeout (sec)

segment.source: Enable User authentication
segment.target: Enable User authentication

segment.source: Enable User authorization
segment.target: Enable User authorization

segment.source: Cache block size (KB)
segment.target: Cache block size (KB)

segment.source: Maximum cache size (MB)
segment.target: Maximum cache size (MB)

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: The App-V Streaming Server uses NTFS file system permissions to control access to the applications under the Content share.
segment.target: The App-V Streaming Server uses NTFS file system permissions to control access to the applications under the Content share.

segment.source: Use Enable User authentication and Enable User authorization to control whether the server checks and enforces those access control lists (ACLs) or not.
segment.target: Use Enable User authentication and Enable User authorization to control whether the server checks and enforces those access control lists (ACLs) or not.

segment.source: On the Ready to Install the Program page, to start the installation, click Install.
segment.target: On the Ready to Install the Program page, to start the installation, click Install.

segment.source: On the Installation Wizard Completed screen, to close the wizard, click Finish.
segment.target: On the Installation Wizard Completed screen, to close the wizard, click Finish.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: The installation can take several minutes to finish.
segment.target: The installation can take several minutes to finish.

segment.source: A status message will flash above the Windows desktop notification area, indicating that the installation succeeded.
segment.target: A status message will flash above the Windows desktop notification area, indicating that the installation succeeded.

segment.source: It is not required to restart the computer when you are prompted.
segment.target: It is not required to restart the computer when you are prompted.

segment.source: However, to optimize system performance, we recommend a restart.
segment.target: However, to optimize system performance, we recommend a restart.

segment.source: Repeat Steps 1–12 for each Virtual Application Server that you have to install.
segment.target: Repeat Steps 1–12 for each Virtual Application Server that you have to install.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.source: How to Install the Servers and System Components
segment.target: How to Install the Servers and System Components
